vote.title: Authorize (1) the Childcare Providers Micro-Grant Program for childcare providers who have been adversely affected by the coronavirus pandemic; and (2) an Interlocal Agreement with Dallas County Local Workforce Development Board, Inc. DBA Workforce Solutions Greater Dallas to administer the Childcare Providers Micro-Grant Program, for the period of August 1, 2020 through December 30, 2020 - Not to exceed $680,000.00 - Financing:  U.S. Department of Treasury Coronavirus Relief Funds
